description: CryptoCoinPay is a revolutionary payment platform that buyers can use on their CryptoCoinPay to trade in their favorite encryption currency (private or commercial). As a trusted intermediary platform, we not only provide sellers with a safe and convenient legal currency collection channel, but also provide buyers with the best consumer service. We use blockchains to creatively combine the best payment protection features in the market today and incorporate the unique features of our CPP tokens. CryptoCoinPay aims to provide buyers with the consumer protection they deserve for online transactions, becoming an intermediary platform, a contradictory mediator, reducing fraud and protecting merchants from cryptocurrency fluctuations by providing refund services. Negative impact. We hope to further optimize the advantages of cryptocurrencies, such as fast transactions, low cost and low cross-border trading resistance, allowing merchants to trade with growing cryptocurrency holders from around the world. In short, our goal is to create a comprehensive payment application programming interface (API) for the market and the ability to become a competitor in PayPal's cryptographic payment industry.
name: CryptoCoinPay
